description: Playwright Paula Vogel is known not just for her work on Broadway — but for the generations of famous playwrights whose careers she has nurtured. Mother Play is about her own mother.
title: In honor of Mother's Day, here's 'Mother Play' — which gestated for 40 years

description: Over some five decades, Corman filled America's drive-ins with hundreds of low-budget movies. Many of Hollywood's most respected directors have at least one Corman picture buried in their resumes.
title: Roger Corman, The B-Movie Legend Who Launched A-List Careers, Dies At 98
